response.msg:
嗯，用户需要了解"十五五规划建议全文"的相关信息。从搜索结果来看，这是一个时效性很强的政治经济议题，涉及到国民经济和社会发展的顶层设计。用户可能是政策研究者、企业战略制定者或关心国家发展的普通民众。

让我梳理一下核心信息源：今天（2025年10月28日）新华社等权威媒体刚刚发布了规划建议全文及说明，这是最原始的官方文件。习近平同志亲自作的说明详细介绍了起草过程和重点内容，应该作为解读的基准。同时需要关注到规划框架由三大部分15个章节61条组成，这个结构非常重要。

在整理时要注意几个关键维度：首先是历史定位，"十五五"处于基本实现现代化承前启后的关键期；其次是六大原则和七大重点任务；特别要突出科技创新和产业升级的内容，因为这是首要任务；民生保障方面健康中国目标提到人均预期寿命再增1岁很具体；还有311万条网民建议被吸纳的民主过程也值得强调。

对于国际影响部分，环球时报社评提到中国规划对世界的意义，外媒关注科技自立的内容可以补充。不过要注意区分官方表述和媒体解读，比如新兴产业规模"再造高技术产业"的表述需要标注是发改委官员的预估而非规划原文。

数据呈现需要严谨：主要目标采用四中全会公报的定性描述，避免对经济增长率等量化指标臆测；任务排序按规划文本的优先级，把现代化产业体系放在首位；风险提示方面需注明"因地制宜发展新质生产力"的官方要求，防止读者误解成运动式推进。

最后考虑用模块化呈现，框架结构单列能让用户快速把握全局，重点任务按领域划分并标注政策亮点，这样既保证权威性又提升可读性。国际反响部分单独成章可能更符合关注全球治理用户的诉求。


以下是关于《中共中央关于制定国民经济和社会发展第十五个五年规划的建议》（简称“十五五”规划建议）的核心内容整理，综合官方发布及权威解读：```wbCustomBlock{"type": "quoted", "index": 1, "data": {"num": [1, 21, 23, 25], "version": 2, "quote_list": [{"name": "新华社", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5226760232767252", "index": 1, "label": "大v"}, {"name": "新华社", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5226761405333917", "index": 21, "label": ""}, {"name": "新华网", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5226760834384337", "index": 23, "label": ""}, {"name": "光明网", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5226774139243481", "index": 25, "label": ""}], "name": "新华社", "img": "https://tvax2.sinaimg.cn/crop.58.61.875.875.50/001R0E0aly8h8vg6xx3srj60rs0rsdko02.jpg?KID=imgbed,tva&Expires=1761654427&ssig=c9lj%2B5nTUq", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5226760232767252", "vType": 3}}```
### 一、规划框架与定位
1. **结构组成**
- **总论板块**（第1-2部分）
总结“十四五”成就，分析“十五五”时期承前启后的历史地位（基本实现社会主义现代化的关键发力期），明确指导思想、原则及主要目标。```wbCustomBlock{"type": "quoted", "index": 5, "data": {"num": [2, 22], "version": 2, "quote_list": [{"name": "人民日报", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5225216305531076", "index": 2, "label": "大v"}, {"name": "人民日报", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5226761803797160", "index": 22, "label": ""}], "name": "人民日报", "img": "https://tvax4.sinaimg.cn/crop.0.0.1018.1018.50/0033ImPzly8h8vgemh8kxj60sa0sadgw02.jpg?KID=imgbed,tva&Expires=1761654427&ssig=cA9GEoX%2BIA", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5225216305531076", "vType": 3}}```
- **分论板块**（第3-14部分）
分领域部署12项战略任务，涵盖产业发展、科技创新、内需市场、乡村振兴、区域协调、文化建设、民生保障、绿色转型、国家安全等。```wbCustomBlock{"type": "quoted", "index": 6, "data": {"num": [2, 32], "version": 2, "quote_list": [{"name": "国是直通车", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5225361493199377", "index": 32, "label": "大v"}, {"name": "人民日报", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5225216305531076", "index": 2, "label": ""}], "name": "国是直通车", "img": "https://tvax2.sinaimg.cn/crop.0.0.377.377.50/006FSgCbly8h8vg9lxgk6j30ah0ahq32.jpg?KID=imgbed,tva&Expires=1761654427&ssig=UL1PSzZ59m", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5225361493199377", "vType": 3}}```
- **保障板块**（第15部分）
强调党的领导、法治建设、港澳台工作及全球治理合作。```wbCustomBlock{"type": "quoted", "index": 7, "data": {"num": [22, 29], "version": 2, "quote_list": [{"name": "人民日报", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5226761803797160", "index": 22, "label": ""}, {"name": "朔州新闻网", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5225202343478145", "index": 29, "label": ""}]}}```

2. **遵循原则**
“六个坚持”：党的全面领导、人民至上、高质量发展、深化改革、有效市场与有为政府结合、统筹发展与安全。```wbCustomBlock{"type": "quoted", "index": 8, "data": {"num": [18, 29], "version": 2, "quote_list": [{"name": "德州新闻网官方微博", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5216479119409913", "index": 18, "label": "大v"}, {"name": "朔州新闻网", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5225202343478145", "index": 29, "label": ""}], "name": "德州新闻网官方微博", "img": "https://tvax4.sinaimg.cn/crop.0.0.190.190.50/5430cc55ly8h8vg7ca1gwj205a05a746.jpg?KID=imgbed,tva&Expires=1761654427&ssig=h2cNBzxS4j", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5216479119409913", "vType": 3}}```
人民日报
德州新闻网官方微博

### 二、核心目标
1. **五年目标（2026-2030年）**
- 高质量发展显著成效，科技自立自强水平大幅跃升；
- 居民收入增长与经济增长同步，中等收入群体持续扩大；
- 美丽中国建设取得重大进展，人均预期寿命提升至80岁左右。```wbCustomBlock{"type": "quoted", "index": 14, "data": {"num": [3, 10, 14], "version": 2, "quote_list": [{"name": "央视新闻", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5224955374734117", "index": 3, "label": "大v"}, {"name": "南方日报", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5225256764576158", "index": 10, "label": ""}, {"name": "CCTV焦点访谈", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5225393649097198", "index": 14, "label": ""}], "name": "央视新闻", "img": "https://tvax3.sinaimg.cn/crop.0.0.690.690.50/002TLsr9ly8i653ifvwbtj60j60j6aai02.jpg?KID=imgbed,tva&Expires=1761654427&ssig=qAGzBMTD%2F9", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5224955374734117", "vType": 3}}```
2. **2035年远景目标**
经济实力、科技实力、综合国力进入世界前列，人均GDP达中等发达国家水平，基本实现社会主义现代化。```wbCustomBlock{"type": "quoted", "index": 15, "data": {"num": [3, 14], "version": 2, "quote_list": [{"name": "CCTV焦点访谈", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5225393649097198", "index": 14, "label": "大v"}, {"name": "央视新闻", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5224955374734117", "index": 3, "label": ""}], "name": "CCTV焦点访谈", "img": "https://tva1.sinaimg.cn/crop.0.0.180.180.50/71eef0e3jw1e8qgp5bmzyj2050050aa8.jpg?KID=imgbed,tva&Expires=1761654427&ssig=IhI6BalodJ", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5225393649097198", "vType": 3}}```
南方日报
CCTV焦点访谈

### 三、重点任务部署
1. **现代化产业体系**
- 首要任务：巩固实体经济根基，推动传统产业智能化升级，培育新兴产业（量子科技、脑机接口、生物制造等）。```wbCustomBlock{"type": "quoted", "index": 19, "data": {"num": [6, 34], "version": 2, "quote_list": [{"name": "央视网", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5225348390455062", "index": 6, "label": "大v"}, {"name": "北京日报", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5225290004436375", "index": 34, "label": ""}], "name": "央视网", "img": "https://tvax4.sinaimg.cn/crop.0.0.180.180.50/003z5L7fly8h8ursf868gj6050050mwz02.jpg?KID=imgbed,tva&Expires=1761654427&ssig=gyzDcOg%2F1m", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5225348390455062", "vType": 3}}```
- 新兴产业规模：未来10年新增规模或再造一个中国高技术产业。```wbCustomBlock{"type": "quoted", "index": 20, "data": {"num": [6], "version": 2, "quote_list": [{"name": "央视网", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5225348390455062", "index": 6, "label": ""}]}}```

2. **科技自立自强**
- 攻关“卡脖子”领域（集成电路、工业母机等），加强基础研究投入。```wbCustomBlock{"type": "quoted", "index": 22, "data": {"num": [6, 28], "version": 2, "quote_list": [{"name": "人民日报海外版-海外网", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5226408074808427", "index": 28, "label": "大v"}, {"name": "央视网", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5225348390455062", "index": 6, "label": ""}], "name": "人民日报海外版-海外网", "img": "https://tvax4.sinaimg.cn/crop.0.0.512.512.50/b63e5bc5ly8hupgurx1g9j20e80e8jrj.jpg?KID=imgbed,tva&Expires=1761654427&ssig=HgGYD4LQhX", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5226408074808427", "vType": 3}}```
- 推进教育、科技、人才一体化发展，建设数字中国。```wbCustomBlock{"type": "quoted", "index": 23, "data": {"num": [14, 22], "version": 2, "quote_list": [{"name": "CCTV焦点访谈", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5225393649097198", "index": 14, "label": ""}, {"name": "人民日报", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5226761803797160", "index": 22, "label": ""}]}}```

3. **扩大内需与开放**
- 破除地方保护，建设全国统一大市场；落实带薪错峰休假，提振消费。```wbCustomBlock{"type": "quoted", "index": 25, "data": {"num": [27, 34], "version": 2, "quote_list": [{"name": "环球总财", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5226772524434041", "index": 27, "label": "大v"}, {"name": "北京日报", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5225290004436375", "index": 34, "label": ""}], "name": "环球总财", "img": "https://tvax3.sinaimg.cn/crop.0.0.1080.1080.50/006yY4eRly8h8vgfs3nunj30u00u03zh.jpg?KID=imgbed,tva&Expires=1761654427&ssig=4Y8CtWnUZI", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5226772524434041", "vType": 3}}```
- 扩大制度型开放，高质量共建“一带一路”，拓展国际经贸合作。```wbCustomBlock{"type": "quoted", "index": 26, "data": {"num": [7, 22], "version": 2, "quote_list": [{"name": "环球网", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5225529686884928", "index": 7, "label": "大v"}, {"name": "人民日报", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5226761803797160", "index": 22, "label": ""}], "name": "环球网", "img": "https://tvax3.sinaimg.cn/crop.0.0.1024.1024.50/001Q8zQmly8h8vgdbgwr3j60sg0sgmxm02.jpg?KID=imgbed,tva&Expires=1761654427&ssig=Q7L3YGio%2Fv", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5225529686884928", "vType": 3}}```

4. **民生与共同富裕**
- 健全社会保障体系，推动房地产高质量发展；
- 推进文旅融合，实施积极文化经济政策。```wbCustomBlock{"type": "quoted", "index": 29, "data": {"num": [10, 36], "version": 2, "quote_list": [{"name": "南方日报", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5225256764576158", "index": 10, "label": ""}, {"name": "财联社APP", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5226766520027321", "index": 36, "label": ""}], "name": "南方日报", "img": "https://tvax2.sinaimg.cn/crop.0.0.640.640.50/001PQmVoly8h8vgdozraej60hs0hs74y02.jpg?KID=imgbed,tva&Expires=1761654427&ssig=V1Jb2f%2FQLu", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5225256764576158", "vType": 3}}```

5. **安全与可持续发展**
- 保障粮食、能源、网络安全；
- 加快建设新型能源体系，推动绿色生产生活方式。```wbCustomBlock{"type": "quoted", "index": 32, "data": {"num": [7, 29], "version": 2, "quote_list": [{"name": "环球网", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5225529686884928", "index": 7, "label": ""}, {"name": "朔州新闻网", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5225202343478145", "index": 29, "label": ""}]}}```
环球网
央视网
北京日报

### 四、规划制定特点
1. **民主参与**
通过网络征集311.3万条民众建议（如AI养老监护、健身设施建设等），习近平总书记要求“认真研究吸纳”。```wbCustomBlock{"type": "quoted", "index": 35, "data": {"num": [9, 11], "version": 2, "quote_list": [{"name": "新华社", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5196616070074131", "index": 9, "label": ""}, {"name": "央视新闻", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5196053890203869", "index": 11, "label": ""}]}}```
2. **战略延续性**
延续“十四五”高质量发展主题，强调新质生产力需“因地制宜”，避免一哄而上。```wbCustomBlock{"type": "quoted", "index": 36, "data": {"num": [22, 35], "version": 2, "quote_list": [{"name": "求是", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5224200823377846", "index": 35, "label": ""}, {"name": "人民日报", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5226761803797160", "index": 22, "label": ""}], "name": "求是", "img": "https://tvax3.sinaimg.cn/crop.0.0.1024.1024.50/003fhXVRly8h8vgltw0hhj60sg0sgwft02.jpg?KID=imgbed,tva&Expires=1761654427&ssig=hPKUr%2Bakag", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5224200823377846", "vType": 3}}```
### 五、权威发布渠道
- **全文获取**：
新华社、人民日报等官方平台已发布规划建议全文及说明。```wbCustomBlock{"type": "quoted", "index": 39, "data": {"num": [21, 23, 25], "version": 2, "quote_list": [{"name": "新华网", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5226760834384337", "index": 23, "label": ""}, {"name": "新华社", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5226761405333917", "index": 21, "label": ""}, {"name": "光明网", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5226774139243481", "index": 25, "label": ""}], "name": "新华网", "img": "https://tvax3.sinaimg.cn/crop.8.11.119.119.50/0034c2ttly8h8vg8d8h2ij6046046q2t02.jpg?KID=imgbed,tva&Expires=1761654427&ssig=peQxPyko3m", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5226760834384337", "vType": 3}}```
- **说明文件**：
习近平《关于〈建议〉的说明》详述起草过程、目标设定依据及重点任务逻辑。```wbCustomBlock{"type": "quoted", "index": 40, "data": {"num": [22, 26], "version": 2, "quote_list": [{"name": "中国日报", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5226773710897551", "index": 26, "label": ""}, {"name": "人民日报", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5226761803797160", "index": 22, "label": ""}], "name": "中国日报", "img": "https://tvax4.sinaimg.cn/crop.0.0.640.640.50/001Oy5dFly8h8vgo0vtpoj60hs0hsweu02.jpg?KID=imgbed,tva&Expires=1761654427&ssig=VLfLYgy64z", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5226773710897551", "vType": 3}}```

---
**注**：规划原文需通过官方渠道获取，以上提炼基于公开的规划建议说明及权威解读。
